doc.title: Small Timers
doc.plot: Over Budget, Behind Schedule... Tired... Cold... Unemployed... And Drunk This documentary exploration about real independent filmmaking follows a group of filmmakers as they create their first feature film - and become great friends. Small timers has screened at national and international film festivals including Baltimore, Los Angeles, Brooklyn, San Antonio, Memphis, Park City, UT and Champaign, IL. As well as every other screening opportunity that comes along. It is also available in many Memphis video stores.
